channel.title: Clean Source: smithing, or no?
channel.description: I'm making a clean source, as my siggy says, but like legit clean. Nothing added. I was thinking of having ONLY basics like combat related skills. No level reqs, no stat bonuses, no skills, no item on item, no object cases, etc. But my tricky question is this: should I keep smithing? It's a bitch and a half to add, but I did remove specs, so yeah :S

item.title: Clean Source: smithing, or no?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

I’m making a clean source, as my siggy says, but like legit clean. Nothing added. I was thinking of having ONLY basics like combat related skills. No level reqs, no stat bonuses, no skills, no item on item, no object cases, etc. But my tricky question is this: should I keep smithing? It’s a bitch and a half to add, but I did remove specs, so yeah :S
